DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to provide additional information on safety and tolerability after multiple does of pantoprazole. Only patients who successfully completed the 3001B3-331 study (NCT00362609) or 3001B3-333 study (NCT00259012) are eligible to participate in this study.
DOC.brief_title: Open Label Safety Study of Enteric-Coated Spheroid Suspension in Infants Aged Less Than 12 Months With Presumed Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
DOC.criteria: Successful completion of the 3001B3331 study (NCT00362609) or 3001B3333 study (NCT00259012) Study. Patients requiring chronic use of warfarin, carbamepazine, or phenytoin.
